A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I actually really enjoyed this movie. It took what The Force Awakens had set up and showed us the other side of all of it - the losses\, failures\, and weaknesses of every single one of the characters. It wasn't afraid to take risks. The music and cinematography were incredible. Long-standing fans didn't seem to like it because it \"didn't feel like Star Wars\"\, but honestly\, I think breaking away from the typical Star Wars formula of \"Light vs Dark\" and \"the heroes win the day\" was a smart idea. The Last Jedi focused on the grey area in the middle of everything and the inevitability of the war that the characters are now a part of. And I loved every second of it.
